si.title: බොග්ලස්
body_lines: මෙවර උතුරු හා නැගෙනහිර ජනතාවගේ ඡන්දය ජනාධිපතිවරණය ජයග්රහණය කිරීමට ඇති ඉඩකඩ අඩුය.

en.title: Boggles
body_lines: This time the votes of the people of the North and East are less likely to win the presidential election.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:
"Boggles: Voter turnout from Northern and Eastern regions may impact presidential election results."

This summary captures the essence of the original statement while adhering to the character limit. It conveys the idea that voter participation from specific geographic areas could influence the outcome of the election.
